goal.en: The objective of the course is to use the python program language to solve scientific and engineering relevant problems. The students in the class can learn how to develop computer programs for practical cases. The class will be delivered with detailed programming skills and the programming logic.
goal.ch: 本課程目標是讓修習的同學瞭解並練習使用python程式語言解決問題，從課程的講授、案例練習與個人專題的練習可以深入了解程式撰寫語法與邏輯。

content.en:
"1.Introduction
2.Introduction of python language
3.Nonlinear equation
4.Solutions to linear equations
5.Interpolation
6.Numerical integration and derivation
7.Numerical solutions to partial differential equations"
content.ch:
"1.課程簡介及規則講解
2.python簡介(1.程式安裝 2.初步入門 3.流程控制 4.模組引用與常用函數 5. 函數定義方式 6.檔案操作 7.繪圖)
3.非線性方程式的根
4.線性方程式求解
5.曲線插值法
6.數值微分與積分
7.數值微分方程"
